page.title: 19A SCHOOL DAY FOR 9 YEAR OLDS
page.content: We get up at 7.30am. We have our breakfast, get washed and dressed, and walk to school by 8.55am. We do {English}and{Mathematics}every morning. On Mondays we go by coach to the {swimming}baths for a half hour lesson. Every day we have break for 20 minutes in the playground. Sometimes we watch a School's{Television}programme to help us with our work. We have a taped {Music}lesson from the Radio once a week, and a{Physical Education}lesson. At noon, we have cooked dinner at school (64p) or bring sandwiches from home. In the afternoons, we have {Project, Art and Craft}and{Games.}We go home at 3.30pm but we can stay at school for{Sports, Drama, Dancing, {Pottery}or{Book Club.}In the evenings, we can stay home and watch television or play games, or go our to{Cubs, {Brownies}or{Swimming Club.} W.P.School
